statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_items
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_id DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT item_name FROM inventory_items WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM inventory_items
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT item_name, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory_items ORDER BY quantity ASC, last_updated DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT item_id, item_name, last_updated FROM inventory_items WHERE item_name LIKE '%apple%'
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, last_updated FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM obsolete_inventory WHERE last_updated < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM obsolete_inventory WHERE last_updated < '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_name, item_id, quantity, last_updated FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE quantity < 50 AND last_updated > '2022-03-01';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM obsolete_inventory WHERE item_id = 5 AND last_updated IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-04-30' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM clearance_strategies;
SELECT item_name, last_updated FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 100 AND item_name LIKE '%shirt%';
SELECT item_name, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory_items WHERE last_updated <= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;

SELECT reports.report_id, inventory_items.item_name, clearance_strategies.strategy_name FROM reports INNER JOIN inventory_items ON reports.item_id = inventory_items.item_id INNER JOIN clearance_strategies ON reports.strategy_id = clearance_strategies.strategy_id WHERE reports.status = 'Completed';
SELECT item_id, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM reports GROUP BY item_id HAVING total_reports > 5 ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM obsolete_inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, last_updated FROM slow_moving_inventory ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM clearance_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE 'Discount%';
SELECT report_date, inventory_status FROM inventory_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM slow_moving_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, last_updated FROM obsolete_inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT report_id, report_date, inventory_status, clearance_strategy_id FROM inventory_reports WHERE clearance_strategy_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_updated FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM inventory_items ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, unit_price FROM inventory_items WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT item_name, quantity, unit_price FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;

SELECT item_name, category_name FROM inventory_items JOIN item_categories ON inventory_items.item_id = item_categories.item_id JOIN inventory_categories ON item_categories.category_id = inventory_categories.category_id;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, strategy_description FROM clearance_strategies WHERE LENGTH(strategy_description) > 50;
SELECT * FROM clearance_logs WHERE clearance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_name, quantity, unit_price FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, clearance_method FROM clearance_strategies WHERE strategy_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT item_id, category_name FROM inventory_categories JOIN item_categories ON inventory_categories.category_id = item_categories.category_id WHERE item_id = 5;
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_items GROUP BY item_name HAVING total_quantity > 100;
